workExamples.siteDescription: Created almost 70 modules. Migrated over 1000 'blog' posts. HubSpot integrations on the forms. Used Lottie, Framer Motion, and CSS to create many animations and interactions. Integrates with a job post api for the job board.

image.alt: Screenshot of the homepage of the Impact Networking site.

workExamples.siteDescription: Improved visiters by 21% and form completions by 12%. Used Framer Motion and CSS to create multiple animations, including my favorite the Contact Us button.

image.alt: Screenshot of the homepage of the ePIPE site.

workExamples.siteDescription: Created a board of all available shipments for transportation, data was pulled from an api and allowed users to request to transport the shipment

image.alt: Screenshot of the homepage of the ZMac site.
